Author: GitHub
Title: The ultimate guide to the GitHub Copilot CLI | Full demo | GitHub Checkout
Description:
In this episode of GitHub Checkout, we take a deep dive into the GitHub Copilot CLI with Product Manager, Ryan Hecht. See how this agentic AI is filling the "last remaining gap" for developers who live in the terminal. This full demo covers installation, codebase exploration, debugging, and contributing to a project without ever leaving the command line.

#GitHubCopilotCLI #GitHubCopilot #Terminal

— Learn more —

https://github.com/github/copilot-cli

00:00 - Introduction: GitHub Copilot CLI 00:55 - Installation and first impressions 01:30 - Understanding a new codebase 03:12 - Solving a common developer problem 04:17 - GitHub Integration Power with MCP server 04:53 - Fixing an issue with the AI agent 05:45 - Your main AI collaborator
